JobFullDesc: Job Description:The Opportunity The Unified Authoring team is a critical part of our Integrated Learning Experiences (ILX) at Pluralsight. This is a new team that will develop the tools to allow authors to create rich learning environments utilizing multiple modalities of learning.We’re hiring a Software Engineer in a US office or US remote to help build the next generation of content and author tooling. As a software engineer in the Skills Development group, you’ll help shape the technical direction of all things Content with other high-performing teams including Product Managers and UX/UI Designers and elite Engineers. You’ll collaborate with a bright, engaging, diverse set of people that are passionate about learning and helping our learners and customers reach their learning goals by crafting scalable, secure software that delights our users. You’d be a great fit if you have experience in the following:Building products with Node and TypescriptCreating and maintaining complex integrations with many servicesMessaging/queueing systems or stream processing systems like Apache Kafka,  RabbitMQ or Cron JobsConsume and create data from numerous streamsDocker and Docker Compose.Designing, building, or supporting high performance distributed systems Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery platforms (GitLab)Writing unit tests and following Test-Driven Development (TDD) practicesPerforming code reviews, and leading/participating in design discussions about architecture, data shape, and business logicProductizing business processes and data flowTopics related to platform scale, security, availability, deployment and operationsDatabase and query performance tuning You’ll love working with us if you like:Test-Driven Development -
